EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Webinar Reminder: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Upcoming Webinar Reminder Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
This is a reminder that you have registered for the webinar - Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview.
Another reminder email with your join link (to the right) will be sent out tomorrow - 20 minutes before we start.
We look forward to having you attend!
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/tztxryv
DATE: October 21, 2011
TIME: 2 PM Eastern | 1 PM Central l Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific
PRESENTER: Dan Voss, Product Manager
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
